ticket.title: Return path semantics of perform_delivery_sendmail vs. perform_delivery_smtp differ
ticket.original-body:
My application expects the *default* Return-Path to be set the same as From.
This is the case in Rails 2.1 for the peform_delivery_smtp function, but not for perform_delivery_sendmail.
A patch to fix it is here: https://secure.mysociety.org/cvstrac/chngview?cn=12833
